content: elevate your play day attire with this sophisticated men s cabled golf cap crochet pattern featuring classic crochet cables this intermediate-level project is perfect for crocheters looking to enhance their skills using your favorite worsted or aran weight yarn this cap is both durable and stylish ensuring you ll stand out on the golf course or in everyday wear **unique features-** classic cable design adds a touch of elegance textured stitches create depth and dimension written pattern for easy following dutch translation available - blog only **materials needed-** hook 6mm us size 10 0 yarn any worsted/medium/4 aran weight 178-180 yards
